description: 'Weight lifting with dumbbells lowers your risk of heart attack, stroke, and cardiovascular disease.'
name: Dumbbell

description: For the body to be healthy and fit, physical activity is required. Cycling regularly is one of the best ways to reduce your risk of health problems
name: Cycling

description: 'The lat pulldown is a great upper body exercise that builds muscle in the back, shoulders, and arms.'
name: Pull Down

description: 'A pull-up or chin-up forces your body to use and engage pretty much every muscle in your upper body.'
name: Push Ups

description: 'The classic ab exercises, situps, involve lying on your back and lifting up your torso. They strengthen the core-stabilizing abdominal muscles through your body weight'
name: Sit Ups

description: 'Running is a great exercise for the heart. Over time, it helps your heart pump more efficiently. Running keeps the arteries elastic so blood flows smoothly.'
name: Running
